PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2001-20132001-11-010,  FIN,  ,  , 
PrecisRegulations Amending the DISCLOSURE OF INTEREST (BANKS) REGULATIONS by specifying that domestic chartered banks must provide a customer who opens an interest-earning deposit account with a written statement that sets out the rate of interest payable thereon and how it is to be calculated.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2001-0469 Publication Date: 2001-11-21
